name: reverse-replication-game
description: Backwards Replication Party Game - mobile friendly web app

scripts.start:443: PORT=80 HTTPS_PORT=443 SSL_CERT_FILE=backwardswords.com.pem SSL_KEY_FILE=backwardswords.com.key node server.js
